capability.name: Customer Case Management
capability.definition: Track and assess case load and resolution activity - allocate resources as necessary to optimize case resolution performance
capability.role: Manage customer case handling, track the effectiveness and impact of case resolution. Evaluate and confirm that the decision making rules and thresholds are well balanced in terms of equitable determination with general customer and merchant acceptance of the process. Ensure and that sufficient and appropriately trained resources are available
capability.example: Customer case handling is assessed over a period and the rules and thresholds guiding resolution decisions recalibrated

key_features.description: Enables define and refine the guiding principles and rules for case resolution to support track and assess case load and resolution activity - allocate resources as necessary to optimize case resolution performance
